field.name: walkid
field.label: Walk in library
field.query: SELECT ID, CONCAT(walkname,' (id ',ID,': ',distancegrade,difficultygrade,')') AS name FROM walks ORDER BY walkname ASC

field.name: leader
field.label: Leader
field.query: SELECT ID, CONCAT(Forename,' ',Surname) AS name FROM walkleaders ORDER BY Forename ASC, Surname ASC

fieldset.name: dates
fieldset.label: When do you want to lead the walk?

field.name: basicavailability
field.label: Do you want to lead at the weekend or in the week?

field.name: weekdays
field.label: Which weekdays can you lead (if applicable)?

field.name: transport
field.label: Timing & transport
field.description: When & where should we meet to go to your walk? If transport is different on different days, remember to say so. Meeting place should normally be Fitzwilliam Street car park or a public transport hub.

field.name: backmarker
field.label: Do you have a backmarker?
field.query: SELECT ID, CONCAT(Forename,' ',Surname) AS name FROM walkleaders ORDER BY Forename ASC, Surname ASC

field.name: comments
field.label: Comments
field.description: Any other comments, e.g. changes to the route description
